channel.title: Server Restarter --- Made by me and fully working
channel.description:
~~~I figured since a lot of other downloads other than server sources and clients go here, mine should to. Just as well, TeleNubby keeps on telling me putting this in the Downloads section is the wrong place... So don't flame me about 'WRONG SECTIONZ NEWB!!!'~~~
Download attached... Or [url=http://uppit.com/LBTLU1]Uppit Download[/url]
-NOTE: I don't get why other people are having so much trouble, :o. It's so easy to use and works good. >.<
-OTHER NOTE: Testing out the TASKKILL command on XP's, tell me if it doesn't work.
Okay, recently I made a restarter for my personal use, but now I see that a lot of servers are up only when the hoster is online... And it sucks. So I decided to release my restarter.
Why use mine instead of Voule's Auto Restarter? Because mine tells you the approximate time until the next restart, tells you the total time the program has been running, and lets you set the restart time to whatever you want; unlike Voule's which gives you only 3 time intervals to choose from.
For all of you people who scan this and say 'LIKE OMGZ! THERE'S A 'KILL' VIRUS!!!'...
That 'kill virus' is a simply C++ command, [code]system("TASKKILL /IM java.exe /F); and system("TASKKILL /IM cmd.exe /F");[/code]
These commands do nothing to harm or damage your computer, and simply kill the currently running Java process and command prompt process, which is how you're current runserver.bat is running, and starts a new one. The reload occurs within about 1-3 seconds.
Enjoy!
Download attached.
Picture: [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p215/zachandnikki/restarter.jpg[/img]
Virus Scan: [IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p215/zachandnikki/Restarter2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Server Restarter --- Made by me and fully working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Patrickftw, post:27, topic:200192”]It’l get locked though :(. And nice restarter. Gl in the future.[/quote]Don’t see why my programs always get locked when other programs even more in-the-wrong-section are here… Lol

But probably. >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 03:43:16 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Yz85Racer, post:22, topic:200192”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=264852.msg2189873#msg2189873 date=1208322826]

[quote author=Zombiedevice link=topic=264852.msg2189861#msg2189861 date=1208322654]

Tons of restarters but w.e…
[/quote]Well I’ve only heard of Voule’s which sucks ass… Actually post something worth reading next time.

Same for you.
[/quote]It’s my thread, I’ll post what I want to post.

No, leave before you embarrass yourself more.[/quote]Such a nice moderator…

Read full topic
